name: Run_scripts on Add to quote
action: <* ExecuteScript(Calculation_Button_Scripts) *><* ExecuteScript(PS_ScriptOnAddtoQuote)*><*CTX( Container(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary_Cont).LoadKeys(PartNumber).Load(select '<*Eval(Replace("<*VALUE(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary)*>",", ","' as PartNumber UNION SELECT '"))*>' as PartNumber   ) )*>
